loadingNotes.noExercises: Oh no ... no exercises have been added yet for this skill. We will add them as soon as we can. Please check back later!

notPartOfCourse.noRecommendation: The skill you are currently practising is not part of the course {course}.
notPartOfCourse.freePracticeRecommendation: The skill you are currently practising is not part of the course {course}. If you want to practice for this course, it's best to use the free-practice-mode.
notPartOfCourse.skillRecommendation: The skill you are currently practising is not part of the course {course}. If you want to practice for this course, it's best to work on {skill}.

alreadyMastered.freePracticeRecommendation: You have already sufficiently mastered this skill! It is more effective for the course {course} to use the free-practice-mode.
alreadyMastered.skillRecommendation: You have already sufficiently mastered this skill! It is more effective for the course {course} if you practice {skill}.

notMastered.onFreePracticeMode: You're not ready yet for free practice on the final level of the course. It is wiser to first practice {skill}.
notMastered.onSkill: You have not yet mastered all the prerequisites for this skill. It is wiser to first practice {skill}.
